text: Leo the Last is a 1970 British drama movie directed by John Boorman and based on the play The Prince by George Tabori. It stars Marcello Mastroianni, Billie Whitelaw, Calvin Lockhart, Brinsley Forde, Graham Crowden and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:British plays adapted into movies Category:Movies directed by John Boorman
title: Leo the Last
